foreignData.name: Kyren-Archiv
foreignData.text:
Du kannst zu Beginn Deines Versorgungs-segments die oberste Karte Deiner Bibliothek verdeckt ganz aus dem Spiel entfernen.
5, wirf alle Karten aus Deiner Hand ab, opfere das KYren-Archiv: Bringe alle Karten, die Du mit dem Kyren-Archiv ganz aus dem Spiel entfernt hast, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers.

name: Kyren Archive
originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove the top card of your library from the game face down.
o5, Discard your hand, Sacrifice Kyren Archive: Put all cards removed from the game with Kyren Archive into their owner's hand.
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile the top card of your library face down.
{5}, Discard your hand, Sacrifice Kyren Archive: Put all cards exiled with Kyren Archive into their owner's hand.
